name: Wheely Stealy
description:
Wheely Stealy is a prototype VR game where you roll your wheelchair around a shopping mall, finding items from your shopping list while avoiding mall cops.

DISCLAIMER: This game is wildly unfinished, and more of a proof of concept for VR wheelchair controls than anything else.

***REQUIRES A VR HEADSET***

Warning: This is an unpolished VR game. Motion sickness is very likely to be a problem.

Control your wheelchair by passing your hands over the top of your wheels, like you're spinning real wheelchair wheels. Hold your hands in place at the top of the wheels to stop their rotation.

Grab items from your list and place them in your basket to collect them. Check off your whole list to win.

Avoid the Mall Cop's line of sight, and outrun him when he spots you.
